item.description:
Meet other group members for a Saturday morning run. We're an informal group and everyone runs at their own pace. Starting out with the group is a good reason to get out of bed on a Saturday morning! You can also decide own mileage by turning around whenever you like, and you don't have to worry about getting lost.

We've had more people coming out in recent weeks - if you been thinking of coming, give it a try! The more people who come, the more likely everyone will find a pace partner.

We meet behind Pier One closest to the canal trail entrance on Skiff.
item.name: Saturday morning run 4/10 - Farmington Canal trail
